Headline: #146 Inner Drive/Michigan Express and # 151 Sheridan Temporary Southbound Reroute near Roscoe/Aldine
ShortDescription: Southbound 146 Inner Drive/Michigan Express and 151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted via Inner Lake Shore Dr, Addison, Broadway, Sheridan and Belmont.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #146 Inner Drive/Michigan Express and # 151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted via Inner Lake Shore Dr, Addison, Broadway, Sheridan and Belmont due to street blockage near Roscoe/Aldine

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #95 95th |Temporary Westbound Reroute near Burley/91st
ShortDescription: Westbound 95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted via 92nd, Buffalo and into the Terminal: due to, street blockage near Burley/91st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted via 92nd, Buffalo and into the Terminal: due to, street blockage near Burley/91st.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
